# uptimekuma_notification_pagerduty (Resource)

PagerDuty notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_pagerduty" "example" {
  name            = "Production Alerts"
  is_active       = true
  integration_url = "https://events.pagerduty.com/integration/YOUR_INTEGRATION_ID/enqueue"
  integration_key = "YOUR_PAGERDUTY_KEY"
  priority        = "high"
  auto_resolve    = "resolved"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Notification name

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `auto_resolve` (String) Auto-resolve incidents
- `integration_key` (String, Sensitive) PagerDuty integration key
- `integration_url` (String, Sensitive) PagerDuty integration URL
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `priority` (String) PagerDuty incident priority

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
